Interface IMazo

All Known Implementing Classes:
Mazo
public interface IMazo
Interface that defines the contract for a deck of cards (Mazo). It specifies the operations that can be performed on a deck, abstracting the implementation details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    agregarAlFinal(Carta carta)
    Adds a single card to the bottom of the deck.
    void
    agregarAlFinal(List<Carta> cartasMesa)
    Adds a list of cards to the bottom of the deck.

    Randomly shuffles the cards currently in the deck.

    Gets the number of cards remaining in the deck.

    Checks if the deck has any cards left.
    Carta

    Draws one card from the top of the deck.

  • Method Details

    • barajar

      void barajar()
      Randomly shuffles the cards currently in the deck.

    • tomarCarta

      Carta tomarCarta() throws MazoVacioException
      Draws one card from the top of the deck.
      Returns:
      the top card from the deck.
      Throws:
      MazoVacioException - if the deck is empty when trying to draw.

    • estaVacio

      boolean estaVacio()
      Checks if the deck has any cards left.
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty, false otherwise.

    • cartasRestantes

      int cartasRestantes()
      Gets the number of cards remaining in the deck.
      Returns:
      the count of remaining cards.

    • agregarAlFinal

      void agregarAlFinal(Carta carta)
      Adds a single card to the bottom of the deck.
      Parameters:
      carta - The card to be added (must not be null).

    • agregarAlFinal

      void agregarAlFinal(List<Carta> cartasMesa)
      Adds a list of cards to the bottom of the deck.
      Parameters:
      cartasMesa - The list of cards to add to the bottom of the deck.
